item.title: Vanilla Creme Brulee
item.description: Ingredients 2 cups heavy cream 1 teaspoon vanilla 1/8 teaspoon salt 5 egg yolks 1/2 cup sugar plus 1 tsp per ramekin for the topping Steps Heat oven to 325 degrees.
